issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of sun emerging from dark clouds after storm with motto POST NUBILA PHÅ’BUS (After dark clouds comes the sun).
issue_obverse_legend_s: THE UNITED STATES of North America | Fifty-five Dollars. THE Bearer is en-titled to receive FIFTY-FIVE Spanish MILLED DOLLARS, or an equal Sum in Gold or Silver, according to a Resolu-tion of CONGRESS of the 14th January, 1779. 55 Dollars.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Nature print of willow and oak leaves.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Printed by HALL and SEL-LERS. 1779. | Fifty-five Dollars.
